Guard Kallesin:
Good! I think you're capable enough to take care of them. That will ease the burden on my soldiers a little, protecting the residents of the town.
Please defeat some Ruin Zombies, Ruin Zombie Leaders, Skeleton Trackers, Skeleton Bowmen, and Ruin Spartoi in the Ruins of Agony. Then, report to Guard Zenath, who's located at the far end of the ruins.
